name: NBlaster
description:
NBlaster is my first ever Game Jam entry and was developed in BlitzMax from scratch / a blank page.  It’s been a while (like 6 years) since I have used BlitzMax, I’d forgotten just how much fun this language was.

I used the following tools to develop NBlaster

  •  BlitzMax (NG) (Compiler)
  •  VSCode (IDE)
  •  BlitzMax For VSCode (Plugin)
  •  HxD Hex Editor (For sprites)

Thanks  :)
